title: Make the Leading Coefficient "1"
text: We can divide both side by $$3$$ and get $$z^2-49=0$$.
speech: We can divide both side by  3  and get  z squared, minus 49 is equal to 0 .
pacedSpeech: We can divide both side by   3
and get   z squared, minus 49 is equal to 0

title: Isolate the Quadratic Term
text: We add $$49$$ to both sides to get $$z^2$$ by itself which gives $$z^2=49$$.
speech: We add  49  to both sides to get  z squared  by itself which gives  z squared is equal to 49 .
pacedSpeech: to both sides to get   z squared
by itself which gives   z squared is equal to 49

title: Use Square root Property
text: The square root property: if $$x^2$$ $$=$$ k, then $$x$$ $$=$$ $$\sqrt{k}$$, or $$x$$ $$=$$ $$-\sqrt{k}$$. $$z^2=49$$, we can take square root both sides and get $$z=\sqrt{49}$$ or $$z=-\sqrt{49}$$.
speech: The square root property: if  x squared  , is equal to,  k, then  x  , is equal to   the square root of k , or  x   is equal to  , negative the square root of k .  z squared is equal to 49 , we can take square root both sides and get  z, is equal to, the square root of 49  or  z is equal to, negative the square root of 49 .

, negative the square root of k
, we can take square root both sides and get   z, is equal to, the square root of 49
or   z is equal to, negative the square root of 49

title: Simplify the Radical
speech: Simplify  minus the square root of 49 .

title: Final Answer
text: Therefore, $$3z^2-147$$ $$=$$ $$0$$ has two solutions which are $$z=-7$$ and $$z=7$$.
speech: Therefore,  3 z squared, minus 147   is equal to,   0  has two solutions which are  z, is equal to, negative 7  and  z, is equal to 7 .
